abstract: James Cramer says he knows first-hand how badly Rupert Murdoch wants Dow Jones. Writing this week in New York magazine, Mr. Cramer, the former hedge fund manager who is now host of the “Mad Money” show on CNBC, tells the story of how Mr. Murdoch called him 11 years ago to discuss the notion of a bid for Dow Jones, which publishes The Wall Street Journal.
